授業方法: HyFlex (Hybrid Flexible) session. However, depending on the public health concerns, there is a possibility of changing to Online Format: Simultaneous and Two-way. Students are expected to participate the first session of the course, so that we can discuss the format and contents of the course. Lectures, article reviews and student presentations will be planned for the course. Please refer to LUNA 3 days before the first session, check class announcements and review a more detailed version of syllabus along with your learning materials. We will use LUNA for exchange of documents, and students are expected to submit assignments via LUNA.

第1回: Download and carefully review a more detailed version of syllabus and handouts from LUNA before the first session.
第2回: The Nature and Tools of Business Research;Elements of a Proposal

トピック.授業外学習2: Students are expected to fully prepare for each session with academic integrity through completion of reading assignments and reviewed academic journal articles, participation of discussion topics, and peer learning experiences as instructed via LUNA and/or in-class announcements.

参考書/Reference books1: Saunders, M., Philip Lewis and Adrian Thornhill
“Research Methods for Business Students”, 8th New Edition
学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic:
各授業科目は、各学部・研究科の定めるディプロマ・ポリシー（DP）・カリキュラム・ポリシー（CP）に基づき、カリキュラム上に配置されています。
DP・CPを意識して本授業科目の学修を進めることで、各学部・研究科の期待する能力が養成されます。
各学部・研究科のDP、CPや教育課程表（授業科目一覧等）は、下記リンクこちらに掲載していますので学修計画の参考にしてください。
https://kwic.kwansei.ac.jp/cabinet/reference?typeCd=0&cabinetId=557&directLink=1
